question: 流行語
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>流行</ja> means "trend", so "trend" <kanji>language</kanji> means a <vocabulary>popular phrase</vocabulary>. Yolo! It could also be a <vocabulary>catchphrase</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>popular word</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>buzzword</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
